about_the_game:
Emma is a young alchemist who lives in Echichi Town. Life is great for her until one day, her mother suddenly goes missing. It turns out that her mother had incurred a hefty debt of 1,000,000 gold to the Baron of Echichi Town, Lord Umuru.

There are a variety of quests and bounties commissioned by the Adventurer's Guild that pay handsome rewards, but require Emma to dive head-first into peril and danger. On the other hand, she can make use of her alchemical abilities to complete quests to help out the villagers and guild alike. What mysteries await Emma on her journey to repay her debt? Will she find out the truth of what happened to her mother? Just what is going on with some of the people in Echichi Town?

In this open world RPG, the key areas of interest in Emma's quest to repay her debt are those that the Adventurer's Guild has deemed dangerous due to Dungeon Masters.

Despite her kind looks, Emma is quite the skilled alchemist in battle, though her spells are limited by the grimoires she has access to. You'll have to mix and match your equipment based on the situation to get the upper hand in combat.

Encounters are initiated by bumping into enemies, but can be escaped at any time. Leveling is also performed by interacting with a certain character you'll meet along the way.

Certain endings and content will require you to enter New Game+, allowing for a high degree of replayability, especially for completionists!

A Multitude of Quests to Complete

In order to earn the money to pay back Emma's debts, you can head to the Adventurer's Guild and complete a number of quests to help out the citizens or the guild itself. Some quests are perilous and require Emma to defeat wanted monsters, but others will require Emma's talent in alchemy to synthesize or gather items for people around town.

Non-Linear Story Progression

The world is vast and holds a number of mysteries. While Emma's main goal is to repay her debt, she will undoubtedly come across mysterious happenings pertaining to her situation, the people close to her, and the world itself. You may also come across some familiar faces, but why they're here is unknown. It's up to you to piece these mysteries together to unravel the truth of this world.

Exploration-based Open-World RPG

There are a ton of areas to explore around Echichi Town and beyond! Emma's journey will take her from dangerous dungeons to interesting locations all throughout the land, and it's all up to you which one you'd like to see first!

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Emma, a young alchemist living in Echichi Town, suddenly has to repay a debt of 1,000,000 gold after her mother, Beth, goes missing. As it turns out, Beth had a debt with the Baron, but was unable to repay it due to unknown circumstances. Will Emma be able to repay this immense amount of money?
